name: Walton
title: Technical Database Manager
description: A Technical Database Manager, his/her task is to oversee the design, implementation, maintenance, and security of databases to ensure efficient data management and support the organization's data-related needs.
responsibility: The responsibility of a Technical Database Manager is to oversee the design, implementation, and maintenance of databases, ensuring data integrity, security, and optimal performance to support the organization's data needs and operations.
requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.

name: Airtel
title: Senior UI/UX Developer
description: A UI/UX (User Interface/User Experience) designer is responsible for designing and creating engaging and effective interfaces for software and web applications. This includes designing the layout, visual design, and interactivity of the user interface.

You will need to be able to effectively communicate your design ideas and gather feedback from other team members.
requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.
